description:
Held at the Pirate Island of Beehive, Koby gets a chance to be free but decides to become a decoy to liberate slaves on the island. Pirates from all over the island come after him because of the big bounty on his head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cours, Kobby. L`évasion ou la mort !
Hashire Koby! Kesshi no Dasshutsu Sakusen!
Renn, Corby! – Eine verzweifelte Strategie zur Flucht!
Run, Koby! A Desperate Escape Strategy!
اركض يا كوبي! خطّة هروب يائسة!
走れコビー! 決死の脱出作戦!
